description: This Java class 'GameService' provides core functionality for managing chess games in a backend application. It includes methods for creating games, joining games, retrieving game state, making moves, and resigning. It integrates with a ChessEngine to apply moves and maintains game state via a repository.

classes.name: GameService
classes.description: Service implementing core chess use-cases such as game creation, join, move, and resignation handling.

methods.name: createGame
methods.description: Creates a new game with specified white and optional black player IDs, initializing the game state.

methods.name: joinGame
methods.description: Allows a player to join an existing game as black if the slot is free.

methods.name: getGame
methods.description: Retrieves a game by its UUID; throws exception if not found.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Applies a move to the game, enforcing turn order and game state rules, updating game status.

methods.name: resign
methods.description: Marks a game as resigned by a player, updating game status.
